LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: Now then...

LABEL: 0x2BC
STRING: What should I do now?

LABEL: 0x2E0
STRING: Yukari was sleeping in the wheelhouse, and Tokiwa was holed up in the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x318
STRING: And, Touri had gone to check up on Reiri with Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x34E
STRING: Reiri hadn't woken up in time for breakfast today, in the end.

LABEL: 0x39E
STRING: Was she still asleep?

LABEL: 0x3D8
STRING: Or, had she woken up already?

LABEL: 0x406
STRING: I might learn what had happened yesterday and why she'd been in the warehouse if she had.

LABEL: 0x45E
STRING: Staying all by myself wouldn't change anything.

LABEL: 0x490
STRING: I decided to go and see Reiri while I still had time.

LABEL: 0x4C8
STRING: As soon as I thought of what to do, I sprung to action. I headed toward the crew room on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x5A5
STRING: As I walked, the only thing I could think about was this accident.

LABEL: 0x5DF
STRING: About all the lives that were lost because of my actions.

LABEL: 0x611
STRING: It wasn't something that could be undone by simply returning five people, at most, alive to the surface.

LABEL: 0x65F
STRING: However, that was all I was able to do.

LABEL: 0x699
STRING: If I didn't, I wouldn't be able to make amends.

LABEL: 0x736
STRING: I didn't hesitate.

LABEL: 0x752
STRING: I just had to do what I could, one thing at a time――

LABEL: 0x7EB
STRING: I eventually made it to the crew room.

LABEL: 0x813
STRING: I caught a glimpse of Hiragino's doctor's coat through the half-open door.

LABEL: 0x86E
STRING: 「You need to rest.」

LABEL: 0x8A1
STRING: 「I told you, I can't do anything if I do that.」

LABEL: 0x8D7
STRING: 「What right do you have to restrict my actions?」

LABEL: 0x928
STRING: 「I'm a doctor. It's not a right; it's my duty to stop patients from being reckless.」

LABEL: 0x97F
STRING: 「Hmph. How overbearing.」

LABEL: 0x9A2
STRING: Hiragino was arguing with a voice I didn't recognize.

LABEL: 0x9CC
STRING: What he said sounded like the right thing, but the tone of his voice led me to believe that he was on the back foot.

LABEL: 0xA30
STRING: But who was he arguing with...?

LABEL: 0xAAF
STRING: Three people turned their attention to me as I entered the room.

LABEL: 0xBB7
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun... You came at a good time.」

LABEL: 0xBEE
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, look, she's――」

LABEL: 0xC21
STRING: Hiragino and Touri were there.

LABEL: 0xC75
STRING: And the girl standing across from them, looking straight at me――

LABEL: 0xD27
STRING: 「Yo, nice to meet you.」

LABEL: 0xDA8
STRING: 「Katagiri Hitoha――」

LABEL: 0xDE5
STRING: A chill ran down my spine.

LABEL: 0xE13
STRING: She'd just called me by name, but... that voice.

LABEL: 0xE49
STRING: She and Touri were twin sisters, which meant they were the same age.

LABEL: 0xE85
STRING: In terms of appearance, she looked much younger, shorter, and had thin limbs that were more like sticks.

LABEL: 0xEE3
STRING: Nevertheless, her voice―it sounded like that of an old woman.

LABEL: 0xF23
STRING: A hoarse voice that seemed to twist itself out from the back of her throat.

LABEL: 0xF53
STRING: Her ghastly voice assaulted the ears of all who heard it, like something tearing through wet paper.

LABEL: 0xFB1
STRING: 「You're...」

LABEL: 0x1037
STRING: 「I haven't introduced myself yet.」

LABEL: 0x105F
STRING: 「I'm Nomura Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x107F
STRING: 「The twin sister of this girl over here.」

LABEL: 0x10B0
STRING: Reiri gestured toward Touri as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x10DE
STRING: Her disrespectful attitude made it hard to believe she saw her as an older sister.

LABEL: 0x1132
STRING: If anything, it was as if she was introducing me to a servant of hers...

LABEL: 0x117E
STRING: What was with this girl?

LABEL: 0x11A2
STRING: However, Touri seemed to take no notice of such treatment.

LABEL: 0x12B7
STRING: 「Hey, Reiri, you should thank him first.」

LABEL: 0x12F4
STRING: 「Ah, right. I heard you were the one who saved me, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x1395
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x13B6
STRING: 「Y-Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x13D4
STRING: Reiri bowed her head... Her somewhat fake-looking expression made me feel uneasy.

LABEL: 0x1414
STRING: No... I was probably overthinking it.

LABEL: 0x143A
STRING: I had a hard time accepting her gratitude... There must be something wrong with me.

LABEL: 0x1498
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x14B0
STRING: How did she know my name?

LABEL: 0x14E6
STRING: It made sense to assume she'd heard it from Touri, but had I ever told her my full name?

LABEL: 0x1540
STRING: I searched through my vague memories, but I couldn't remember anything as trivial as that.

LABEL: 0x15BE
STRING: Well, whatever. Not that it mattered.

LABEL: 0x15F0
STRING: In fact, the problem right now was――

LABEL: 0x166D
STRING: Hiragino was holding his head in his hands while chewing on a tablet.

LABEL: 0x169F
STRING: 「Did something happen, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x16CB
STRING: 「It sounded like you were arguing...」

LABEL: 0x1771
STRING: 「Yeah, we were.」

LABEL: 0x1793
STRING: 「The moment Reiri-kun woke up, she said he wanted to go outside by herself and refused to listen.」

LABEL: 0x17E6
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: I got the gist of the situation.

LABEL: 0x183E
STRING: She had been found in the warehouse yesterday and had been asleep for some time afterward.

LABEL: 0x1886
STRING: And, just when she had woken up, she disappeared only to be found unconscious later.

LABEL: 0x18CC
STRING: As a doctor, he couldn't allow her to walk around on her own again.

LABEL: 0x199C
STRING: 「I'm not saying I want to go alone.」

LABEL: 0x19DF
STRING: Reiri waved her hand dismissively.

LABEL: 0x1A09
STRING: Her eyes pierced Hiragino like a snake.

LABEL: 0x1AA5
STRING: 「I just don't trust doctors.」

LABEL: 0x1AE5
STRING: 「What I'm saying is, I don't want that guy following me around.」

LABEL: 0x1B3E
STRING: 「Hey, don't be rude!」

LABEL: 0x1BDA
STRING: 「Won't you allow me to have any privacy?」

LABEL: 0x1C19
STRING: Reiri refused to listen to her sister.

LABEL: 0x1C6F
STRING: It would be fair to say that twin sisters generally didn't get along that well,

LABEL: 0x1CC1
STRING: but Reiri's unwillingness to respond to Touri's one-sided contact

LABEL: 0x1D0F
STRING: made their relationship seem somewhat strained.

LABEL: 0x1E06
STRING: 「That's not what I'm talking about. I'm saying it's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x1EB8
STRING: 「How about this, then?」

LABEL: 0x1EE4
STRING: 「I'll go with her. She won't be alone that way, right?」

LABEL: 0x1F3D
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x1F5C
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head at Touri's suggestion.

LABEL: 0x1F97
STRING: 「You're... both still young.」

LABEL: 0x1FC1
STRING: 「Leaving two kids by themselves is still dangerous...」

LABEL: 0x2021
STRING: 「This again?」

LABEL: 0x20B8
STRING: 「How is it dangerous?」

LABEL: 0x20EC
STRING: 「If you think that I'll be in danger unless you come with me,

LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: then I can only think of that as a way for you to feel at ease.」

LABEL: 0x21AC
STRING: A stalemate, huh?

LABEL: 0x21DC
STRING: I could see Hiragino's point.

LABEL: 0x2200
STRING: Besides, I could understand why he wanted to avoid a situation where Touri and Reiri were alone together.

LABEL: 0x225B
STRING: However, Reiri was being stubborn.

LABEL: 0x227F
STRING: I couldn't tell while she was asleep, but in contrast to her frail limbs that looked like they could break at any moment,

LABEL: 0x22D5
STRING: she was a good talker... or rather, her verbal attack power was high.

LABEL: 0x230F
STRING: She seemed to have a comeback for every situation, and coupled with her arrogant attitude, it left a bad image of her in my mind.

LABEL: 0x236F
STRING: If it wasn't Hiragino she was against... Actually, if it were me, I might've resorted to using force already.

LABEL: 0x2421
STRING: 「Now, how long are you going to keep that up?」

LABEL: 0x2457
STRING: 「Doctor, all that's left is for you to decide.」

LABEL: 0x24B5
STRING: Reiri cornered Hiragino in a manner that felt very out of character.

LABEL: 0x24F7
STRING: The smirk on her face... The corners of her mouth curled up like a snake.

LABEL: 0x2547
STRING: As for Hiragino, he still seemed troubled...

LABEL: 0x25D5
STRING: 「...Then, shall I go with her?」

LABEL: 0x2637
STRING: Surprise was written all over Touri's face.

LABEL: 0x266B
STRING: Hiragino and Reiri also slowly turned to look at me.

LABEL: 0x2761
STRING: 「If you're worried about leaving the two of them alone, I'll go with her.」

LABEL: 0x27BA
STRING: 「I'm not ROMLES staff, but I do know where everything is on the ship.」

LABEL: 0x281A
STRING: 「And if anything happens, I'll contact Hiragino-san right away.」

LABEL: 0x28C2
STRING: 「...If that's the case, I don't mind...」

LABEL: 0x2901
STRING: Hiragino cast a sidelong glance at Reiri as he replied.

LABEL: 0x296B
STRING: Drawn along by his eyes, I looked over to her only to find her staring straight at me.

LABEL: 0x2AF8
STRING: 「That's fine.」

LABEL: 0x2B19
STRING: Reiri nodded with her eyes closed.

LABEL: 0x2B55
STRING: All right... Now that that was decided, the rest was simple.

LABEL: 0x2BE2
STRING: 「Okay then, we're off, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x2C2D
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2C66
STRING: As we passed each other, he whispered something to me.

LABEL: 0x2CFC
STRING: 「You're free to move around for now, but if anything strange happens, contact me right away.」

LABEL: 0x2D5F
STRING: 「Yeah, got it.」

LABEL: 0x2DEB
STRING: As we were about to leave the crew room, Touri ran up behind us.

LABEL: 0x2EA3
STRING: 「Wait, I'll go too!」

LABEL: 0x2F33
STRING: 「I don't need you with me.」

LABEL: 0x2F7F
STRING: Reiri cut her off bluntly.

LABEL: 0x2FDF
STRING: Leaving Touri frozen in place behind me,

LABEL: 0x302B
STRING: I followed after Reiri, who was walking off at a brisk pace, unable to hide her smile.

LABEL: 0x3332
STRING: Leaving the crew room behind, Reiri strode forward without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x3380
STRING: But... where were we headed?

LABEL: 0x33AC
STRING: 「Hey, where are we going?」

LABEL: 0x3448
STRING: 「The emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x3465
STRING: 「The emergency room?」

LABEL: 0x347F
STRING: Why there again...?

LABEL: 0x349D
STRING: Was she not feeling well after waking up?

LABEL: 0x34D7
STRING: If that was the case, it would be easier to ask Hiragino for a check-up instead of going to the emergency room...

LABEL: 0x359D
STRING: 「That's not it.」

LABEL: 0x35B5
STRING: 「I think I dropped my medicine.」

LABEL: 0x35E8
STRING: 「Medicine?」

LABEL: 0x366C
STRING: 「I had them with me when I woke up in the emergency room before.」

LABEL: 0x36B0
STRING: 「I have no idea where I lost them, but...」

LABEL: 0x373F
STRING: 「The best place to start looking is there, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x3790
STRING: Reiri shrugged her shoulders, looking for my approval.

LABEL: 0x37BC
STRING: I... couldn't give her an answer.

LABEL: 0x37E6
STRING: I had no idea where Reiri was yesterday between the time she woke up in the emergency room and the time she was found again.

LABEL: 0x386A
STRING: If she had been in the emergency room the whole time, she was right.

LABEL: 0x38AA
STRING: But on the other hand, was it really okay for me to take her words at face value?

LABEL: 0x38F8
STRING: I felt bad for doubting her based on first impressions,

LABEL: 0x392E
STRING: but it was also true that I couldn't call her trustworthy.

LABEL: 0x39DE
STRING: 「What's wrong, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x3A05
STRING: 「...Right, the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x3A2F
STRING: 「I'll show you the way. Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x3A60
STRING: 「That's not necessary.」

LABEL: 0x3A99
STRING: With that, Reiri turned her back to me and started walking.

LABEL: 0x3ACD
STRING: All I could do was follow her...

LABEL: 0x3B0B
STRING: I didn't fully trust her, but there was no point in getting stuck doubting her.

LABEL: 0x3B69
STRING: Who was Reiri, and what was her true objective?

LABEL: 0x3B9D
STRING: She might still be hiding something...

LABEL: 0x3BD1
STRING: I had no choice but to keep that in mind and watch her every move.

LABEL: 0x3C1B
STRING: Eventually, we arrived at the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x3D5D
STRING: 「How nostalgic.」

LABEL: 0x3D7D
STRING: 「Well, let's start looking.」

LABEL: 0x3DC0
STRING: Saying that, Reiri began walking around the room by herself.

LABEL: 0x3DFA
STRING: She crouched down, looked above, inside, below, and behind the shelves...

LABEL: 0x3E3A
STRING: ...It was a long process.

LABEL: 0x3E5E
STRING: 「Hey.」

LABEL: 0x3EE0
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x3EFF
STRING: 「Um, should I help too? If I know the name or shape of the medicine, I can look for it, but...」

LABEL: 0x3FC1
STRING: 「No thanks. You can just sit on that chair over there.」

LABEL: 0x4002
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x4038
STRING: I was turned down.

LABEL: 0x4058
STRING: I didn't know what Reiri was up to, but frankly, I was bored...

LABEL: 0x40A6
STRING: She didn't seem to be in much of a hurry as she continued searching at her own pace without worrying about me.

LABEL: 0x4108
STRING: I sat down at Hiragino's desk as she suggested, but...

LABEL: 0x416A
STRING: ...I was bored.

LABEL: 0x41DF
STRING: 「...Um, is it okay if I call you "Reiri?"」

LABEL: 0x4222
STRING: 「Suit yourself.」

LABEL: 0x4243
STRING: Reiri answered without giving me as much as a look.

LABEL: 0x4275
STRING: Her voice was a whisper, but in a quiet room like this, it was more than loud enough.

LABEL: 0x42BE
STRING: 「How did you get tickets for this ship, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x4370
STRING: 「Didn't she tell you?」

LABEL: 0x43A3
STRING: "She"... I guess she meant Touri.

LABEL: 0x43C3
STRING: 「All she said was that she got a ticket from you.」

LABEL: 0x4477
STRING: 「That girl... I thought I told her clearly.」

LABEL: 0x44AD
STRING: 「...Knowing her, she's probably forgotten about it already.」

LABEL: 0x44F6
STRING: Reiri sighed deeply, deliberately, and sarcastically.

LABEL: 0x4538
STRING: ...I was concerned about her attitude toward her own sister, but I guess it wasn't my place to say anything.

LABEL: 0x45FA
STRING: 「So, as to where those tickets came from...」

LABEL: 0x4620
STRING: 「I got them through my connections.」

LABEL: 0x4647
STRING: 「With whom?」

LABEL: 0x466E
STRING: 「No comment.」

LABEL: 0x4691
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x46AD
STRING: ...That was the same as not answering at all.

LABEL: 0x46E3
STRING: But to think that she had the connections to get a ticket for the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0x4736
STRING: How did a mere high school girl come to have connections like that?

LABEL: 0x477C
STRING: I was curious, but it didn't sound like she was going to give me an answer.

LABEL: 0x47B6
STRING: 「Um... What were you doing in the warehouse during that accident?」

LABEL: 0x4856
STRING: 「I got lost.」

LABEL: 0x4873
STRING: 「But that's not the kind of place you can normally go into――」

LABEL: 0x48C2
STRING: 「No comment.」

LABEL: 0x48E5
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x491B
STRING: I was interrupted before I even had the chance to finish my question.

LABEL: 0x495D
STRING: I thought it would be nice to figure out what she, who happened to appear in unexpected places, was up to, but...

LABEL: 0x49BD
STRING: It was the same for both times. First, when she was in the warehouse at the time of the accident,

LABEL: 0x49EF
STRING: and later, when she was found in the flooded hallway with strangulation marks on her neck.

LABEL: 0x4A43
STRING: I'd love to ask her about the strangling, but...

LABEL: 0x4A87
STRING: I couldn't be sure how much of it she even remembered.

LABEL: 0x4AC5
STRING: I probably shouldn't bring up a shocking subject like that in front of the person in question.

LABEL: 0x4B8A
STRING: 「Does your injury hurt?」

LABEL: 0x4C3A
STRING: 「Can I ask you something?」

LABEL: 0x4CC7
STRING: 「Will you die if you don't keep talking to people, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x4D0A
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4D20
STRING: Reiri looked at me with eyes full of dismay and disdain.

LABEL: 0x4D76
STRING: Well... That couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0x4D9C
STRING: I wasn't normally this talkative, but...

LABEL: 0x4DDA
STRING: Just sitting here in silence would be worse.

LABEL: 0x4E34
STRING: Actually, it was thanks to me that we'd come this far to find what she was looking for.

LABEL: 0x4E96
STRING: Did she not feel the slightest bit of gratitude toward me?

LABEL: 0x4EC4
STRING: Unaware of my simmering thoughts, Reiri continued her search by herself.

LABEL: 0x4F7E
STRING: 「Hm, what's this...?」

LABEL: 0x4FA5
STRING: 「Ah, that's the pressurization room.」

LABEL: 0x4FC7
STRING: In the back of the emergency room was the pressurization room and the hatch that led to the outside of the ship.

LABEL: 0x5011
STRING: Reiri's interest seemed piqued by the heavy door, which didn't match the pastel interior of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5085
STRING: Clang.

LABEL: 0x509D
STRING: Opening the heavy door, she peered inside and froze still.

LABEL: 0x50E7
STRING: 「...What's up?」

LABEL: 0x510B
STRING: The pressurization room wasn't a very large space, nor did it have any interesting equipment inside.

LABEL: 0x5163
STRING: What had caught her attention? Just as I stood up and was about to approach her...

LABEL: 0x51C6
STRING: 「No, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x51EF
STRING: Closing the door to the pressurization room with a thud, she turned back to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x522F
STRING: She walked right up to me and stopped.

LABEL: 0x52D9
STRING: 「Well, I'm done here.」

LABEL: 0x52FB
STRING: 「Let's go to the next place.」

LABEL: 0x5322
STRING: Her sudden declaration caught me off-guard.

LABEL: 0x534C
STRING: From what I could tell, Reiri had only been able to search about half of the area.

LABEL: 0x5398
STRING: 「You're finished? Did you find your medicine?」

LABEL: 0x5442
STRING: 「I'm done here... Didn't I just say that?」

LABEL: 0x5477
STRING: As she spoke, Reiri opened her palm and showed something to me.

LABEL: 0x54B5
STRING: There were a handful of pills on her small and bony hand.

LABEL: 0x5501
STRING: 「Ah, so you did find them. Where were they?」

LABEL: 0x553D
STRING: Reiri's mouth twisted into a slight smile.

LABEL: 0x55CF
STRING: 「No comment.」

LABEL: 0x56EB
STRING: The next place we headed to was the library.

LABEL: 0x5725
STRING: ...She didn't hesitate a bit, as if she had a perfect map of the ship inside her head.

LABEL: 0x5775
STRING: It made sense that she would remember the location of the emergency room, which she had likely been to several times by now,

LABEL: 0x57C5
STRING: but I didn't think she'd ever been to the library before...

LABEL: 0x58A7
STRING: As soon as she entered, she surveyed all the equipment in the room.

LABEL: 0x5961
STRING: 「Hmm... I see.」

LABEL: 0x5988
STRING: 「What are we doing here, exactly?」

LABEL: 0x5A26
STRING: 「What? It's no big deal, right?」

LABEL: 0x5A50
STRING: 「There's still time before the rescue, isn't there?」

LABEL: 0x5ADF
STRING: 「I wouldn't be doing this if we didn't have time to kill.」

LABEL: 0x5B1A
STRING: Ignoring all the PDAs lined up, she instead booted up a desktop PC at the far end of the room.

LABEL: 0x5B6B
STRING: She said she was just killing time, but what was she planning to do with such a huge device?

LABEL: 0x5BD1
STRING: The information accessible inside the <SHEEP III> was quite limited in the first place.

LABEL: 0x5C24
STRING: We weren't able to contact the surface―audio and video transmissions weren't working.

LABEL: 0x5C7C
STRING: That meant we had no access to the wider network, to begin with.

LABEL: 0x5CBE
STRING: So, no matter how high-spec the PC you used was,

LABEL: 0x5D00
STRING: we could only view the data that was inside this ship.

LABEL: 0x5D46
STRING: Then again, the data on this ship...

LABEL: 0x5D7C
STRING: ROMLES boasted the world's largest marine database,

LABEL: 0x5DBE
STRING: and you could spend endless hours browsing it.

LABEL: 0x5DFE
STRING: If that was what she wanted to do, a PDA would suffice.

LABEL: 0x5E33
STRING: So, what was she planning on doing...?

LABEL: 0x5E69
STRING: I snuck a peek from behind her as she went to the display.

LABEL: 0x5F21
STRING: 「Peeping? That's quite the hobby.」

LABEL: 0x5F56
STRING: 「Huh?! ...Ah, sorry...」

LABEL: 0x5F80
STRING: Reiri reprimanded me while keeping her eyes on the monitor.

LABEL: 0x5FBA
STRING: I apologized reflexively, and she exhaled in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x606A
STRING: 「Honestly...」

LABEL: 0x6088
STRING: 「One minute you're asking questions, and the next you're peeping.」

LABEL: 0x60AE
STRING: 「I was told you saved my life, so I didn't want to say anything,

LABEL: 0x6151
STRING: but to put it bluntly, maybe we shouldn't send you back to the surface, after all.」

LABEL: 0x619C
STRING: 「This is a misunderstanding, okay?!」

LABEL: 0x61BE
STRING: 「Don't make me out to be some kind of pervert!」

LABEL: 0x620E
STRING: The things she was saying were quite scandalous.

LABEL: 0x6242
STRING: After I hurriedly denied her accusations, Reiri cleared her throat.

LABEL: 0x627E
STRING: I looked back at her, wondering if that was a cough――

LABEL: 0x62B2
STRING: Her eyes narrowed, her mouth twisted, and her body folded like it was about to break.

LABEL: 0x62EA
STRING: Sure enough, she was laughing.

LABEL: 0x6316
STRING: Her distorted expression made it seem like she was angry or suffering.

LABEL: 0x6372
STRING: However, she was definitely laughing... There was no doubt about it.

LABEL: 0x6430
STRING: 「You sound so desperate, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x6450
STRING: 「You're bored right now, right?」

LABEL: 0x6485
STRING: 「Yeah. Maybe more than you think. I've got a lot of free time on my hands.」

LABEL: 0x64DE
STRING: 「No problem. It's just as I expected.」

LABEL: 0x658F
STRING: 「If you need a way to pass the time, then... Yes.」

LABEL: 0x65BD
STRING: 「How about this?」

LABEL: 0x65FC
STRING: I accepted a PDA Reiri offered to me.

LABEL: 0x6635
STRING: The application being launched on it was for reading e-books.

LABEL: 0x666B
STRING: I tapped it, and what appeared on the screen was a name of a book――

LABEL: 0x66A3
STRING: 「What's this...?」

LABEL: 0x672D
STRING: 「It's a mystery novel published over half a century ago.」

LABEL: 0x67C6
STRING: 「You're more of a science guy, right? ...Even so, you must have at least heard the title.」

LABEL: 0x681D
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x6837
STRING: I'd definitely heard this title somewhere before.

LABEL: 0x686F
STRING: I wasn't a big fan of mystery, as she had guessed.

LABEL: 0x68A3
STRING: If even I'd heard of it before, it must be a really famous novel.

LABEL: 0x695F
STRING: 「The story began on December 10th, 1954.」

LABEL: 0x69C5
STRING: 「Any ideas what it's about?」

LABEL: 0x6A0C
STRING: As I remained silent, Reiri continued in the same tone.

LABEL: 0x6AB8
STRING: 「Do you know about the Toya Maru accident?」

LABEL: 0x6AE4
STRING: 「The worst tragedy in Japanese maritime history occurred in 1954.」

LABEL: 0x6B1C
STRING: 「Including the dead and missing, there were 1155 victims.」

LABEL: 0x6B61
STRING: A marine accident with countless victims.

LABEL: 0x6B87
STRING: The scenery of the submerged rear section that I boarded yesterday came back to me.

LABEL: 0x6BC3
STRING: The lives that were lost in the dark while trying to save themselves, but were unable to escape.

LABEL: 0x6C0B
STRING: The PDA creaked slightly in the palm of my reflexively clenched hand.

LABEL: 0x6CA5
STRING: 「Yes... This novel is based on a real-life accident.」

LABEL: 0x6D00
STRING: 「Now, don't go saying that it's imprudent, okay?」

LABEL: 0x6D63
STRING: It portrayed a real-life accident as fiction.

LABEL: 0x6D8D
STRING: In a way, it felt like an affront to reality.

LABEL: 0x6DC5
STRING: I couldn't say that it wasn't imprudent.

LABEL: 0x6E6F
STRING: 「It was a tragedy of the worst kind.」

LABEL: 0x6E97
STRING: 「Why did such a tragedy happen? Was there no way to avoid it?」

LABEL: 0x6EED
STRING: 「This piece was written as if in defiance of that reality.」

LABEL: 0x6F3E
STRING: 「But in the end, stories are just stories.」

LABEL: 0x6F6A
STRING: 「Even if it wasn't poking fun at it,

LABEL: 0x6F9A
STRING: dramatizing and conveniently rewriting reality only serves to create a fictional world.」

LABEL: 0x7062
STRING: 「I wonder about that.」

LABEL: 0x7084
STRING: 「Fiction can condemn someone, or it can save someone.」

LABEL: 0x70D8
STRING: 「Did you know people have complained that reading through it causes mental problems?」

LABEL: 0x717F
STRING: 「You shouldn't underestimate the power of fiction.」

LABEL: 0x71DE
STRING: The profile of the girl facing the display was distorted.

LABEL: 0x7210
STRING: She let out a chilling, scornful laugh――

LABEL: 0x7245
STRING: 「The story resists reality.」

LABEL: 0x726D
STRING: 「It encroaches on reality.」

LABEL: 0x72BB
STRING: 「――Strangely enough, the day the author who wrote this book passed away...」

LABEL: 0x7307
STRING: 「...Was on December 10th, the same day his work was revealed.」

LABEL: 0x7357
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x7373
STRING: There was a sudden error sound.

LABEL: 0x7391
STRING: Reiri stopped operating the computer.

LABEL: 0x73BD
STRING: I might be of help here... I was an IT guy, after all.

LABEL: 0x7405
STRING: I quickly peered at the display and saw multiple terminal windows pop up.

LABEL: 0x7457
STRING: Reiri made an annoyed expression.

LABEL: 0x74EB
STRING: 「...I made a small mistake.」

LABEL: 0x7570
STRING: 「DvorakJP, huh...? What a troublesome setting.」

LABEL: 0x75A1
STRING: Reiri closed the windows with a practiced hand.

LABEL: 0x75DB
STRING: Her quick and precise response was clearly not that of an ordinary high school girl.

LABEL: 0x7643
STRING: 「Reiri... Just who are you?」

LABEL: 0x7671
STRING: I squeezed the question out of my throat.

LABEL: 0x76A8
STRING: 「We're in the same line of business.」

LABEL: 0x76C9
STRING: Saying so casually, Reiri hit the return key and got out of her chair.

LABEL: 0x778B
STRING: 「Come on, we're done here.」

LABEL: 0x77B4
STRING: 「Where are we going next?」

LABEL: 0x77DC
STRING: Reiri was going around the ship as she pleased for a purpose I didn't know about.

LABEL: 0x7820
STRING: I was already prepared to be forced to go along with her.

LABEL: 0x78BB
STRING: But when Reiri faced me, her mouth turned into a grin.

LABEL: 0x7926
STRING: 「Well, shall we head back?」
